name: Around The World - Ludum Dare 38 - 2017
description:
A very short game made for Ludum Dare 38.

Ludum Dare 38 theme - A Small World.

For this jam, I went in with a goal of learning animation in Unity so the LD theme, I came up with an idea that I felt would benefit my learning. The idea was that you are a man who spends his life walking and no matter which way you go, time always progresses. This is shown by the changing of the seasons.

@CharlieKinglake
